description: Located on the outskirts of Forlì’s charming historic centre, this simple, modern yet attractive restaurant serves eclectic and varied cuisine. More traditional fare on offer includes an excellent selection of hams and grilled meats, as well as delicious tagliatelle al ragù, while the menu also features a few more creative options including a few fish dishes.
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Terrace, Wheelchair access
